entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WASM leg failed in CI - RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #59911
  • 'The "Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility.ValidatePackage" task failed unexpectedly' in libs legs #59908
  • [API Proposal]: Flag to include all SSL intermediate certificates explicitly in SslStreamCertificateContext #59906
  • [s390x] Missing full RELRO (-z,now) support in a mono-based libcoreclr.so #59904

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean-up crossgen's NuGet dependencies et. al. #59914
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs conform to interop guidelines #59913
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix license header in a few new files #59910
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1400373 #59909
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a macro usage and cleanup stale comment #59907
    community-contribution
  • Improve regex reductions and code gen for some alternations #59903
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle version #59783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More tweaks to regex source generator code #59834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Fix IDE0008 in DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59885
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add back the nethost archive. #59847
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix genCodeForInitBlkUnroll for x86 #59873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
